sense.name: the quality of being important, worthy of attention
sense.commentary: SIGNIFICANCE[+quality][+worthy][+of_attention] Note: refers to the importance of something, not what it stands for.
sense.examples: Health insurance has become a social issue of some significance. The significance of the composer's works was not fully appreciated in his lifetime. The environmentalists did not understand the significance of nuclear power.

sense.name: the meaning or implication of something
sense.commentary: SIGNIFICANCE[+entity][+abstract][+information][+meaning] Note: refers to what something means or signifies, what it symbolizes.
sense.examples: What is the significance of the men removing their hats? The significance of his remarks was intentionally ambiguous. The significance of a given color is not the same across different cultures.

sense.name: degree of a result's deviation from a random distribution
sense.examples: The significance of these tests is only at the .05 level. We could find no statistical significance in these results.
